channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 14:34 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 14:34 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages. #Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:16 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291
